fileDescription: Strings for the Xbox wrapper extension.

xbox_uwp.name: Xbox UWP
xbox_uwp.description: Provides Xbox integration when exporting for Xbox UWP.

title-id.name: Title ID
title-id.desc: The Title ID for this project as provided by the Microsoft Partner Center.

scid.name: SCID
scid.desc: The Service Configuration ID (SCID) as provided by the Microsoft Partner Center.

creators-program.name: Creators title
creators-program.desc: Check when using the Xbox Live Creators Program.

is-available.description: True if running in WebView2 with Xbox UWP features available.

is-creators-program.description: True if the 'Creators title' property is checked.

is-signed-in.description: True if the user is currently signed in to use Xbox Live services.

on-sign-in-success.description: Triggered after 'Sign in' when successfully signed in.

on-sign-in-error.description: Triggered after 'Sign in' when signing in failed.

on-sign-in-silently-success.description: Triggered after 'Sign in silently' when successfully signed in.

on-sign-in-silently-error.description: Triggered after 'Sign in silently' when signing in failed.

on-sign-out-completed.description: Triggered when user sign out completes.

on-set-presence-success.description: Triggered after 'Set presence' when set successfully.

on-set-presence-failed.description: Triggered after 'Set presence' when failed to set.

on-update-achievement-success.description: Triggered after 'Update achievement' when successful for a specific achievent.

on-update-achievement-failed.description: Triggered after 'Update achievement' when failed for a specific achievent.

on-update-any-achievement-success.description: Triggered after 'Update achievement' when successful for any achievent.

on-update-any-achievement-failed.description: Triggered after 'Update achievement' when failed for any achievent.

on-title-storage-operation-success.description: Triggered after a title storage operation completed successfully.

storage-tag.name: Storage tag
storage-tag.desc: Tag of the associated title storage operation.

on-title-storage-operation-failed.description: Triggered after a title storage operation failed.

storage-tag.name: Storage tag
storage-tag.desc: Tag of the associated title storage operation.

on-any-title-storage-operation-success.display-text: On any title storage operation success
on-any-title-storage-operation-success.description: Triggered after any title storage operation completed successfully.

on-any-title-storage-operation-failed.display-text: On any title storage operation failed
on-any-title-storage-operation-failed.description: Triggered after any title storage operation failed.

sign-in.description: Prompt the user to sign in to their account via user interface.

sign-in-silently.description: Attempt to sign in the user automatically without showing any user interface.

set-presence.display-text: Set presence to active in title [b]{0}[/b]
set-presence.description: Set the user's active in title status.

active-in-title.name: Active in title
active-in-title.desc: Whether the user is currently active in the title.

update-achievement.description: Unlock an achievement or update its progress.

percent-complete.name: Percent complete
percent-complete.desc: A number from 0-100 indicating the percentage complete.

title-storage-upload-binary.display-text: Upload binary {2} to title storage [i]{0}[/i] path [i]{1}[/i] type [i]{3}[/i] (storage tag [i]{4}[/i])
title-storage-upload-binary.description: Upload the contents of a Binary Data object to title storage.

storage-type.name: Storage type
storage-type.desc: The storage type to upload to.

path.name: Path
path.desc: The file path to upload to.

binary-data.name: Binary data
binary-data.desc: The binary data object to upload the contents of.

blob-type.name: Blob type
blob-type.desc: The type of the data being uploaded.

storage-tag.name: Storage tag
storage-tag.desc: An optional tag to identify this title storage operation.

title-storage-upload-text.display-text: Upload text [i]{2}[/i] to title storage [i]{0}[/i] path [i]{1}[/i] type [i]{3}[/i] (storage tag [i]{4}[/i])

storage-type.name: Storage type
storage-type.desc: The storage type to upload to.

path.name: Path
path.desc: The file path to upload to.

blob-type.name: Blob type
blob-type.desc: The type of the data being uploaded.

storage-tag.name: Storage tag
storage-tag.desc: An optional tag to identify this title storage operation.

title-storage-download-binary.display-text: Download binary to {2} from title storage [i]{0}[/i] path [i]{1}[/i] type [i]{3}[/i] (storage tag [i]{4}[/i])
title-storage-download-binary.description: Download binary data from title storage.

storage-type.name: Storage type
storage-type.desc: The storage type to download from.

path.name: Path
path.desc: The file path to download from.

binary-data.name: Binary data
binary-data.desc: The binary data object to store the downloaded data.

blob-type.name: Blob type
blob-type.desc: The type of the data that was originally uploaded.

storage-tag.name: Storage tag
storage-tag.desc: An optional tag to identify this title storage operation.

title-storage-download-text.display-text: Download text from title storage [i]{0}[/i] path [i]{1}[/i] type [i]{2}[/i] (storage tag [i]{3}[/i])

storage-type.name: Storage type
storage-type.desc: The storage type to download from.

path.name: Path
path.desc: The file path to download from.

blob-type.name: Blob type
blob-type.desc: The type of the data that was originally uploaded.

storage-tag.name: Storage tag
storage-tag.desc: An optional tag to identify this title storage operation.

title-storage-delete.display-text: Delete title storage [i]{0}[/i] path [i]{1}[/i] type [i]{2}[/i] (storage tag [i]{3}[/i])
title-storage-delete.description: Delete an item from title storage.

storage-type.name: Storage type
storage-type.desc: The storage type to delete from.

blob-type.name: Blob type
blob-type.desc: The type of the data being uploaded.

storage-tag.name: Storage tag
storage-tag.desc: An optional tag to identify this title storage operation.

error-message.description: In an error trigger, the error message if available.

sandbox.description: The currently configured sandbox such as "XDKS.1". It is empty until you sign in.

title-id.description: The title ID set in the object's properties.

scid.description: The Service Configuration ID (SCID) set in the object's properties.

sign-in-status.description: After attempting sign in, one of "success", "user-interaction-required" or "user-cancel".

gamer-tag.description: The public gamertag associated with the user.

age-group.description: The age group of the user.

xbox-user-id.description: A unique ID associated with this user.

achievement-id.description: In an achievement trigger, the associated achievement ID.

storage-tag.description: In a title storage trigger, the associated storage tag.

download-text.description: The downloaded text after successfully downloading from title storage.
